hero.title: 全端React軟件工程師 <emoji>🚀</emoji>
hero.intro: Hello! 我係 Bobby Ho，一個充滿熱誠，來自香港嘅軟件工程師 <emoji>🔥</emoji>

experience.title: 經驗 <emoji>🎯</emoji>
experience.frontendDevelopment: I'm proficient in responsive web design. I can build application from basic CSS, HTML, Javascript or using frameworks like React and Next.js.
experience.backendDevelopment: I'm experienced in Node.js, Nest.js and Express.js. I can build APIs using DTO pattern for self-use or for third-party use such as Sanity CMS, Stripe payment and Shopify E-commerce; Integrate relational databases like Postgres or document databases like Firestore.
experience.passionateProgrammer: I love utilizing cutting-edge development tools and techniques. Also enjoy writing clean, maintainable, and well-documented code to ensure code quality and best practices.
experience.teamPlayer: As a former HKUST Dragon Boat Team captain, I understand the importance of teamwork and enjoy being a team player. Therefore, I would bring this experience into the working environment to collaborate with cross-functional teams for ensuring high-quality product delivery.

project.title: 專案 <emoji>🐣</emoji>
project.subtitle: 近期完成的專案
project.startupWeb: Developed a fully responsive website for a startup. The site is optimized to work across all devices and platforms.
project.mobileApp: A simple Pomodoro Timer app using Flutter. You can customize your study timer and choose from a variety of aesthetic themes.

thisSite.title: 關於此站<emoji>🌞</emoji>
thisSite.subtitle: 效能優先
thisSite.content: Built on [Next.js](https://nextjs.org/) primitives like `@next/font` and `next/image` for stellar performance.

contact.title: 聯絡我 <emoji>🧙</emoji>
contact.content: Do you have a job opportunity or idea you'd like to discuss? Feel free to reach me on <githubUrl>Github</githubUrl> and <linkedinUrl>Linkedin</linkedinUrl>~
